title: IMF Annual Summit Volunteer Recognition
description: Acknowledged for outstanding volunteer service during the IMF Annual Summit, contributing to the successful organization of the event and providing support to international delegates.

title: Volunteer Excellence Award
description: Honored for exceptional dedication and service in organizing blood donation drives, first-aid training, and disaster relief programs in underprivileged communities.

title: Best Student Research Paper Award
description: Awarded for publishing a research paper on XGBoost-based predictive modeling to enhance customer engagement strategies in the industrial sector.

title: First Place - Data Science Hackathon
description: Won first place in a national data science hackathon, developing a predictive model to optimize inventory management for an e-commerce platform, improving demand forecasting accuracy by 25%.
